#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#define MAX 1005
using namespace std;

/*
 Real happiness lies in thinking abt person's smile whom we care abt! :)
 
 catalan numbers!!
*/


unsigned long  long int catalan[MAX];

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int cases;
	unsigned long long int ans;
	int n;
	
	scanf("%d",&cases);
 
    
    catalan[0] = catalan[1] = 1;   //catalan[2]=1;
 
    // Fill entries in catalan[] using recursive formula
    for (int i=2; i<=1000; i++)
    {
        catalan[i] = 0;
        for (int j=0; j<i; j++)
          {  catalan[i] += (catalan[j] * catalan[i-j-1]);
           if(catalan[i]>=10000)   catalan[i]=catalan[i]%10000;  }
    }
   
 //  printf("\n%llu %llu %llu",catalan[0],catalan[1],catalan[5]);
	
	while(cases--)
	{
	  scanf("%d",&n);
	
	if(n==0)  { printf("0\n");   continue;  }
	  else {
	   printf("%llu\n",catalan[n-1]);  }
	   
	}
	return 0;
}
